<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get static QR Code by ID.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v2/pix/deposits/qr-codes/static/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve a specific static QR Code associated with the user by its unique identifier.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"id","required":true,"in":"path","description":"Static QR Code ID.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Header Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"nonce","in":"header","description":"The nonce ID is a UUID (v4) used to uniquely identify the requisition. All requisitions must have an identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Static QR Code found.

schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"If it is true, static QR Code can be paid many times. <b>When it is false, expiration date is required.</b>","example":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"state"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`PENDING`, `READY`, collapsible={false} name={"created_at"} required={true} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"format":"date-time","type":"string","description":"Static QR Code created at.","example":"2024-04-22T17:42:56.900Z"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n
